title: problem with using labeling GUI
body:
Hi,

I am labeling a large number of frames, due to the sparse presence of the behaviour I am looking at. I seem to run into some error whenever I add labels. I can label of few frames and then the GUI stops working and a error message is displayed. Then I have to reopen the labeling GUI find the frame I was at and start labeling again- but this occurs every few frames which is very inconvenient.

This is the error message that python displays:
wx._core.wxAssertionError: C++ assertion "Assert failure" failed at ..\..\src\msw\toolbar.cpp(938) in wxToolBar::Realize(): Could not add bitmap to toolbar

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:

SystemError: <class 'wx._core.SizeEvent'> returned a result with an error set
wx._core.wxAssertionError: C++ assertion "Assert failure" failed at ..\..\src\msw\toolbar.cpp(938) in wxToolBar::Realize(): Could not add bitmap to toolbar

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:

SystemError: <class 'wx._core.SizeEvent'> returned a result with an error set
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\zcbtaii\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\deeplabcut\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\generate_training_dataset\labeling_toolbox.py", line 568, in nextImage
    self.buttonCounter = MainFrame.plot(self,self.img)
  File "C:\Users\zcbtaii\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\deeplabcut\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\generate_training_dataset\labeling_toolbox.py", line 634, in plot
    self.figure.canvas.draw()
  File "C:\Users\zcbtaii\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\deeplabcut\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backends\backend_wxagg.py", line 31, in draw
    self.bitmap = _convert_agg_to_wx_bitmap(self.get_renderer(), None)
  File "C:\Users\zcbtaii\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\deeplabcut\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backends\backend_wxagg.py", line 96, in _convert_agg_to_wx_bitmap
    agg.buffer_rgba())
RuntimeError: Failed to gain raw access to bitmap data.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\zcbtaii\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\deeplabcut\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backends\backend_wx.py", line 817, in _onPaint
    self.gui_repaint(drawDC=drawDC)
  File "C:\Users\zcbtaii\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\deeplabcut\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backends\backend_wx.py", line 783, in gui_repaint
    drawDC.DrawBitmap(bmp, 0, 0)
wx._core.wxAssertionError: C++ assertion "bmp.IsOk()" failed at ..\..\src\msw\dc.cpp(1313) in wxMSWDCImpl::DoDrawBitmap(): invalid bitmap in wxMSWDCImpl::DrawBitmap

Anybody encountered this before and can give me any advice on how to solve it?
Also is there a way for when I reopen the GUI to jump directly to a certain frame without having to press next for all the frames that are already labeled?

Many thanks in advance!
